name: Global Tour Club
description:
GTCâ€™s Metaverse Strategy allows users to:

Explore virtual travel destinations
Attend events, exhibitions, or virtual tours
Earn NFTs, GTC rewards, and exclusive passes

Integrate with physical bookings (e.g., book your real trip directly from your metaverse visit)
Metaverse tourism serves as a powerful tool for marketing, customer engagement, and new revenue streams.
